cause.description:
Mental Illness is a serious issue facing many Americans and those throughout the world. Many fail to recognize that the person suffering from the illness isn't the only one experiencing pain; family members share a great burden of the pain.
As someone who has dealt with a family member with a mental disorder ,I can attest that I have suffered a great deal of pain.
1. The first step to understanding the illness is to learn about it
2. The illness is not the person
3. You are not alone and there are services available to you
cause.mission: To inform children, adolescents, and Adults about mental illness and how to cope with it in the family.
cause.name: Children with Parents who suffer from Mental Illness
